mapper.select: SELECT TS.STUDY_ID AS studyId, TS.PRTCPNT_ID AS prtcpntId, TS.SUMRY_SEQ AS sumrySeq, TM.MNTRNG_SEQ AS mntrngSeq, TS.AE_NO AS aeNo, TM.REVISN_NO AS revisnNo, TM.MEDDRA_CODE AS medDraCode, TM.AE_TERM_CTCAE AS aeTermCtcae, TM.AE_TERM_OTHER AS aeTermOther, TM.AE_GRADE AS aeGrade, DATE_FORMAT(TM.AE_STRT_DE, '%Y%m%d') AS aeStrtDe, DATE_FORMAT(TM.AE_END_DE, '%Y%m%d') AS aeEndDe, TM.MNTRNG_MEMO AS mntrngMemo, DATE_FORMAT(TM.MNTRNG_REGIST_DE, '%Y%m%d') AS mntrngRegistDe, DATE_FORMAT(TM.VISIT_RESVE_DE, '%Y%m%d') AS visitResveDe, TM.MNTRNG_DCSN_AT AS mntrngDcsnAt, TM.MNTRNG_DCSN_ESNTL_ID AS mntrngDcsnEsntlId, (SELECT CONCAT(TU.USER_NM, '(', TU.EMAIL_ADRES, ')') FROM COMTNUSERINFO TU WHERE TU.ESNTL_ID = TM.MNTRNG_DCSN_ESNTL_ID) AS mntrngDcsnUser, TM.SAE_AT AS saeAt, TM.SAE_DEATH AS saeDeath, TM.SAE_LIFE_THRT AS saeLifeThrt, TM.SAE_HSPTLZ_NEED AS saeHsptleNeed, TM.SAE_CSMALFNC AS saeCsmalfnc, TM.SAE_CSDEFORM AS saeCsdeform, TM.SAE_ETC_SITTN AS saeEtcSittn, TM.CAUSALITY_CODE AS causalityCode, TM.PREDICT_AT AS predictAt, TM.AE_ACTION_CODE AS aeActionCode, TM.ETC_ACTION_CODE AS etcActionCode, DATE_FORMAT(TM.MEDCIN_STOP_DE, '%Y%m%d') AS medcinStopDe, TM.AE_RSLT_CODE AS aeRsltCode, DATE_FORMAT(TM.ACTION_DE, '%Y%m%d') AS actionDe, TM.ACTION_MEMO AS actionMemo, TM.ACTION_DCSN_AT AS actionDcsnAt, TM.ACTION_DCSN_ESNTL_ID AS actionDcsnEsntlId, (SELECT CONCAT(TU.USER_NM, '(', TU.EMAIL_ADRES, ')') FROM COMTNUSERINFO TU WHERE TU.ESNTL_ID = IFNULL(TM.ACTION_DCSN_ESNTL_ID, T3.CNFRMR_ESNTL_ID)) AS actionDcsnUser, IF(TM.MNTRNG_SEQ = T2.MAXSEQ, 'Y', 'N') AS maxRevisnAt, (SELECT CONCAT(IF(IFNULL(TC.GRADE1, '-') = '-', '', CONCAT('1 ',TC.GRADE1, '\\n')), IF(IFNULL(TC.GRADE2, '-') = '-', '', CONCAT('2 ',TC.GRADE2, '\\n')) , IF(IFNULL(TC.GRADE3, '-') = '-', '', CONCAT('3 ',TC.GRADE3, '\\n')), IF(IFNULL(TC.GRADE4, '-') = '-', '', CONCAT('4 ',TC.GRADE4, '\\n')) , IF(IFNULL(TC.GRADE5, '-') = '-', '', CONCAT('5 ',TC.GRADE5))) AS gradeTitle FROM AEMSTUDY TS LEFT JOIN PCNCTCAE TC ON TS.CTCAE_VER = TC.CTCAE_VER WHERE TS.STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND TC.MEDDRA_CODE = TM.MEDDRA_CODE) AS gradeDc FROM AEMSUMRY TS LEFT JOIN AEMMNTRNG TM ON TS.STUDY_ID = TM.STUDY_ID AND TS.PRTCPNT_ID = TM.PRTCPNT_ID AND TS.SUMRY_SEQ = TM.SUMRY_SEQ, (SELECT MAX(TM0.MNTRNG_SEQ) AS MAXSEQ FROM AEMMNTRNG TM0 WHERE TM0.STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND TM0.PRTCPNT_ID = #{prtcpntId} AND TM0.SUMRY_SEQ = #{sumrySeq} GROUP BY TM0.STUDY_ID, TM0.PRTCPNT_ID, TM0.SUMRY_SEQ) T2, (SELECT TP.CNFRMR_ESNTL_ID FROM AEMSTDYPRTCPNT TP WHERE TP.STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND TP.PRTCPNT_ID = #{prtcpntId}) T3 WHERE TS.STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND TS.PRTCPNT_ID = #{prtcpntId} AND TS.SUMRY_SEQ = #{sumrySeq} AND TM.MNTRNG_SEQ = IFNULL(#{mntrngSeq}, T2.MAXSEQ)

SELECT SETUPITEM_CODE AS setupitemCode ,CASE WHEN SETUPITEM_CODE = 'FILE_UPLOAD_EXT' THEN LOWER(SETUPITEM_VAL) ELSE SETUPITEM_VAL END AS setupitemVal ,SETUPITEM_DC AS setupitemDc ,SETUPITEM_ETCINFO AS setupitemEtcinfo FROM SYSSETUP WHERE SETUPITEM_GRP = 'CMM'

SELECT ATCH_FILE_ID, FILE_CN, FILE_SN, FILE_STRE_COURS, STRE_FILE_NM, FILE_EXTSN, ORIGNL_FILE_NM, FILE_SIZE, SORT_ORDR, SORT_ORDR AS OLD_SORT_ORDR, ENCRYPT_VAL, IFNULL(STR_TO_DATE(LEFT(RIGHT(STRE_FILE_NM,17),12),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), (SELECT M.CREAT_DT FROM COMTNFILE M WHERE M.ATCH_FILE_ID = COMTNFILEDETAIL.ATCH_FILE_ID)) CREAT_DT FROM COMTNFILEDETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId} ORDER BY SORT_ORDR ASC, FILE_SN ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AEMPRTCPNTSYMPTMS ( STUDY_ID ,PRTCPNT_ID ,SYMPTMS_SEQ ,SYMPTMS_REGTYPE_CODE ,SYMPTMS_TITLE ,SYMPTMS_CONFIRM ,CALL_PARTNER ,SYMPTMS_CN ,SYMPTMS_REGIST_DE ,SYMPTMS_STRTDE ,FRST_REGISTER_ID ,LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( #{studyId} ,#{prtcpntId} ,GET_NEXT_SYMPTMS_SEQ(#{studyId}, #{prtcpntId}) ,#{symptmsRegtypeCode} ,'NO TITLE' ,IFNULL(#{symptmsConfirm}, 'N') ,IFNULL(#{callPartner}, '') ,IFNULL(#{symptmsCn}, '') ,STR_TO_DATE(IFNULL(#{symptmsRegistDe}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')), '%Y%m%d') ,STR_TO_DATE(IFNULL(#{symptmsRegistDe}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')), '%Y%m%d') ,#{frstRegisterId} ,#{lastUpdusrId} )
mapper.select: SELECT TPS.STUDY_ID AS studyId, TPS.PRTCPNT_ID AS prtcpntId, TPS.SYMPTMS_SEQ AS symptmsSeq, TPS.SYMPTMS_REGTYPE_CODE AS symptmsRegtypeCode, DATE_FORMAT(TPS.SYMPTMS_REGIST_DE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS symptmsRegistDe, TPS.SYMPTMS_TITLE AS symptmsTitle, DATE_FORMAT(TPS.SYMPTMS_STRTDE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS symptmsStrtDe, DATE_FORMAT(TPS.SYMPTMS_ENDDE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS symptmsEndDe, CONCAT_WS('~',DATE_FORMAT(TPS.SYMPTMS_STRTDE, '%Y-%m-%d'), IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(TPS.SYMPTMS_ENDDE, '%Y-%m-%d'),'')) AS symptmsDe, TPS.SYMPTMS_CN AS symptmsCn, TPS.ATCH_FILE_ID AS atchFileId, TPS.OUTBND_CALL_AT AS outbndCallAt, TPS.CALL_PARTNER AS callPartner, TPS.VISIT_TYPE_CODE AS visitTypeCode, TPS.VISITRULE_SEQ AS visitRuleSeq, (SELECT TRMT_STEP FROM AEMVISITRULE TVR WHERE TVR.STUDY_ID = TPS.STUDY_ID AND TVR.VISITRULE_SEQ = TPS.VISITRULE_SEQ) AS trmtStep, (SELECT TU.USER_NM FROM COMTNUSERINFO TU WHERE TU.ESNTL_ID = TPS.FRST_REGISTER_ID) AS registerNm, IF(T1.CNT > 0, 'Y', 'N') AS useAt, SYMPTMS_CONFIRM AS symptmsConfirm FROM AEMPRTCPNTSYMPTMS TPS LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TMS.STUDY_ID, TMS.PRTCPNT_ID, TMS.SYMPTMS_SEQ, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM AEMMNTRNGSYMPTMS TMS GROUP BY TMS.STUDY_ID, TMS.PRTCPNT_ID, TMS.SYMPTMS_SEQ) T1 ON TPS.STUDY_ID = T1.STUDY_ID AND TPS.PRTCPNT_ID = T1.PRTCPNT_ID AND TPS.SYMPTMS_SEQ = T1.SYMPTMS_SEQ WHERE TPS.STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND TPS.PRTCPNT_ID = #{prtcpntId} AND TPS.SYMPTMS_SEQ = #{symptmsSeq}

SELECT studyId, prtcpntId, sumrySeq, mntrngSeq, symptmsSeq, treeKey, level, code, treeItem FROM ( SELECT TMS.STUDY_ID AS studyId , TMS.PRTCPNT_ID AS prtcpntId , TMS.SUMRY_SEQ AS sumrySeq , TMS.MNTRNG_SEQ AS mntrngSeq , TMS.SYMPTMS_SEQ AS symptmsSeq , CONCAT_WS('|',TMS.STUDY_ID,TMS.PRTCPNT_ID,TMS.SUMRY_SEQ,TMS.MNTRNG_SEQ,TMS.SYMPTMS_SEQ) AS treeKey , 3 AS level , '' AS code , CONCAT('[',CONCAT_WS('][', CMMCD.CODE_NM, TPS.SYMPTMS_TITLE, CONCAT_WS('~',DATE_FORMAT(TPS.SYMPTMS_STRTDE, '%Y-%m-%d'),IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(TPS.SYMPTMS_ENDDE, '%Y-%m-%d'), ''))),']') AS treeItem FROM AEMMNTRNGSYMPTMS TMS JOIN AEMPRTCPNTSYMPTMS TPS ON TPS.STUDY_ID = TMS.STUDY_ID AND TPS.PRTCPNT_ID = TMS.PRTCPNT_ID AND TPS.SYMPTMS_SEQ = TMS.SYMPTMS_SEQ JOIN AEMSUMRY TSJ ON TSJ.STUDY_ID = TMS.STUDY_ID AND TSJ.PRTCPNT_ID = TMS.PRTCPNT_ID AND TSJ.SUMRY_SEQ = TMS.SUMRY_SEQ JOIN AEMMNTRNG TM ON TM.STUDY_ID = TMS.STUDY_ID AND TM.PRTCPNT_ID = TMS.PRTCPNT_ID AND TM.SUMRY_SEQ = TMS.SUMRY_SEQ AND TM.MNTRNG_SEQ = TMS.MNTRNG_SEQ LEFT JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE CMMCD ON CMMCD.CODE_ID = 'AEM007' AND CMMCD.CODE = TPS.SYMPTMS_REGTYPE_CODE WHERE TMS.STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND TMS.PRTCPNT_ID = #{prtcpntId} AND TM.MNTRNG_DCSN_AT = 'Y'
AND TSJ.AE_END_DE IS NULL
AND TM.ACTION_DCSN_AT = 'N'
AND TM.ACTION_DCSN_AT = 'Y'
UNION ALL SELECT TM.STUDY_ID , TM.PRTCPNT_ID , TM.SUMRY_SEQ , TM.MNTRNG_SEQ AS mntrngSeq , NULL AS symptmsSeq , CONCAT_WS('|',TM.STUDY_ID,TM.PRTCPNT_ID,TM.SUMRY_SEQ,TM.MNTRNG_SEQ,'') AS treeKey , 2 AS level , TM.ACTION_DCSN_AT AS code , CONCAT('[',CONCAT_WS('][', CONCAT('',TM.ae_term_ctcae) , IFNULL(TGD.CODE_NM,'-') , IF(TM.ACTION_DCSN_AT='Y','조치확정','조치미확정') ),']') AS treeItem FROM AEMMNTRNG TM JOIN AEMSUMRY TSJ ON TSJ.STUDY_ID = TM.STUDY_ID AND TSJ.PRTCPNT_ID = TM.PRTCPNT_ID AND TSJ.SUMRY_SEQ = TM.SUMRY_SEQ LEFT JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE TGD ON TGD.CODE_ID = 'AEM009' AND TGD.CODE = TM.AE_GRADE WHERE TM.STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND TM.PRTCPNT_ID = #{prtcpntId} AND TM.MNTRNG_DCSN_AT = 'Y'
AND TSJ.AE_END_DE IS NULL
AND TM.ACTION_DCSN_AT = 'N'
AND TM.ACTION_DCSN_AT = 'Y'
UNION ALL SELECT TS.STUDY_ID , TS.PRTCPNT_ID , TS.SUMRY_SEQ , NULL AS mntrngSeq , NULL AS symptmsSeq , CONCAT_WS('|',TS.STUDY_ID,TS.PRTCPNT_ID,TS.SUMRY_SEQ,'','') AS treeKey , 1 AS level , '' AS code , CONCAT('[',CONCAT_WS('][', CONCAT('AE##',AE_NO), TS.AE_TERM_CTCAE, CONCAT_WS('~',DATE_FORMAT(TS.AE_STRT_DE, '%Y-%m-%d'),IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(TS.AE_END_DE, '%Y-%m-%d'), '')), IFNULL(TGD.CODE_NM,'-'), IF(TS.AE_END_DE IS NULL,'OnGoing','Stopped')),']') AS treeItem FROM AEMSUMRY TS JOIN ( SELECT TM.STUDY_ID, TM.PRTCPNT_ID, TM.SUMRY_SEQ, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM AEMMNTRNG TM WHERE TM.STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND TM.PRTCPNT_ID = #{prtcpntId} AND TM.MNTRNG_DCSN_AT = 'Y'
AND TM.ACTION_DCSN_AT = 'N'
AND TM.ACTION_DCSN_AT = 'Y'
GROUP BY TM.STUDY_ID, TM.PRTCPNT_ID, TM.SUMRY_SEQ ) TJ ON TJ.STUDY_ID = TS.STUDY_ID AND TJ.PRTCPNT_ID = TS.PRTCPNT_ID AND TJ.SUMRY_SEQ = TS.SUMRY_SEQ LEFT JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE TGD ON TGD.CODE_ID = 'AEM009' AND TGD.CODE = TS.AE_GRADE WHERE TS.STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND TS.PRTCPNT_ID = #{prtcpntId}
AND TS.AE_END_DE IS NULL
) AA WHERE mntrngSeq is not null and symptmsSeq is null ORDER BY sumrySeq, mntrngSeq, symptmsSeq

SELECT studyId, prtcpntId, enrlNo, initial ,CONCAT(symptmsCnt,' ',IF(visitScheduledDe1 IS NOT NULL,'방문','')) AS newSymptms ,sexdstnCode, telno, birthday, pcnAppId ,IFNULL(visitScheduledDe1, visitScheduledDe2) AS visitForecastDe ,cnfrmrNm ,DATE_FORMAT(regDt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS regDt FROM ( SELECT TD.STUDY_ID AS studyid , TD.PRTCPNT_ID AS prtcpntId , TD.ENRL_NO AS enrlNo , TP.INITIAL AS initial , CONCAT(IFNULL(TS.CONFIRM,0),'(',IFNULL(TS.SCNTALL,0),')') AS symptmsCnt , TP.SEXDSTN_CODE AS sexdstnCode , TP.TELNO AS telno , CONCAT_WS('-', LPAD(TP.BRTHDY_YEAR, 4, '0'), LPAD(TP.BRTHDY_MONTH, 2, '0'), LPAD(IFNULL(TP.BRTHDY_DATE,''), 2, '0')) AS birthday , TP.PCN_APP_ID AS pcnAppId , (SELECT MIN(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(TD.MDCTN_STRTDE, INTERVAL TVS.TERM_DAYS DAY), '%Y%m%d')) FROM AEMVISITRULE TVS WHERE STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND DATEDIFF(DATE(NOW()), TD.MDCTN_STRTDE) BETWEEN (TERM_DAYS - ALWNC_DAYS) AND (TERM_DAYS + ALWNC_DAYS) ) AS visitScheduledDe1 , TU.USER_NM AS cnfrmrNm , (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MIN(DATE_ADD(TD.MDCTN_STRTDE, INTERVAL TVS.TERM_DAYS DAY)), '%Y%m%d') FROM AEMVISITRULE TVS WHERE STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND DATE_ADD(TD.MDCTN_STRTDE, INTERVAL TVS.TERM_DAYS DAY) > IFNULL(LAST_VISITDE, NOW()) ) AS visitScheduledDe2 , TS.regDt FROM AEMSTDYPRTCPNT TD JOIN AEMPRTCPNT TP ON TP.PRTCPNT_ID = TD.PRTCPNT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PRTCPNT_ID , SUM(IF(DATE_FORMAT(SYMPTMS_REGIST_DE, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN IFNULL(NULLIF(#{startDe},''),'00000000') AND IFNULL(NULLIF(#{endDe},''),'99991231'), 1,0)) AS SCNT , SUM(IF(SYMPTMS_CONFIRM = 'N', 1, 0)) AS CONFIRM , COUNT(*) AS SCNTALL , MAX(SYMPTMS_REGIST_DE) AS regDt FROM AEMPRTCPNTSYMPTMS TPS WHERE STUDY_ID = #{studyId} GROUP BY PRTCPNT_ID ) TS ON TS.PRTCPNT_ID = TD.PRTCPNT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PRTCPNT_ID, MAX(SYMPTMS_STRTDE) AS LAST_VISITDE FROM AEMPRTCPNTSYMPTMS WHERE STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND SYMPTMS_REGTYPE_CODE = '400' GROUP BY PRTCPNT_ID ) TV ON TV.PRTCPNT_ID = TD.PRTCPNT_ID LEFT JOIN COMTNUSERINFO TU ON TU.ESNTL_ID = TD.CNFRMR_ESNTL_ID WHERE TD.STUDY_ID = #{studyId} AND TD.STDYINST_ID = #{stdyInstId} AND TD.PRTCPNT_END_CODE IS NULL AND TD.CNFRMR_ESNTL_ID IS NOT NULL AND TD.MDCTN_STRTDE IS NOT NULL
AND TP.INITIAL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND TP.TELNO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND TP.PCN_APP_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
) TDATA WHERE 1=1
AND NOT(symptmsCnt IS NULL AND visitScheduledDe1 IS NULL) /* 전체일 경우 블럭 */
AND visitScheduledDe1 IS NOT NULL /* 오늘방문예정일 경우 */
ORDER BY regDt desc, enrlNo
